While most herexens were clerics or clergy in life, fallen champions were holy crusaders that upheld the ideals of their deity while fighting enemies of the church and defending its congregants. Fallen champions are direct in their actions and wage their divine war on a grand scale. This fallen champion once worshiped the Arcadian goddess [Kazutal](/Deities.aspx?ID=41), also called Mother Jaguar. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 26 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 [Fallen Champion](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1871) **Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 113 **Perception** +17; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +14, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Kazutal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +16, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +17 **Str** +5 **Dex** +2 **Con** +5 **Int** +2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +5 **Items** _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [machete](/Weapons.aspx?ID=95)_, defiled [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Kazutal](/Deities.aspx?ID=41), _+1 [scale mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=8), _ [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10) --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +19 **Ref** +14 **Will** +17 **HP** 130 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Agent of Despair** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 15 feet. A fallen champion emanates an aura of utter despair. Living creatures are [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) while in a fallen champion's aura. They can't naturally recover from this fear while in the area but recover instantly once they leave the aura.
**Final Blasphemy** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) When the herexen is destroyed, it explodes in a wave of negative energy with the effects of a 4th-level, 3-action [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) spell (DC 26). The herexen is destroyed, so it doesn't gain any Hit Points from this use of _harm_, and it doesn't need to have any _harm_ spells remaining to use this ability.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _machete_ +20 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)), **Damage** 2d6+11 slashing plus heretic's smite **Divine Innate Spells** DC 25 - **4th** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×2) **Champion Devotion Spells** DC 25, 2 Focus Points - **4th** [Touch of Corruption](/Spells.aspx?ID=819), [Unimpeded Stride](/Spells.aspx?ID=464) **Heretic's Armaments** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61)) While the fallen champion wields the favored weapon of its former deity, that weapon gains the effect of a [_fearsome_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=731) property rune. **Heretic's Smite** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) While wielding the favored weapon of its former deity (such as a [machete](/Weapons.aspx?ID=95) for an ex-[Kazutal](/Deities.aspx?ID=41) herexen), the herexen's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 evil damage against creatures that can cast [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) spells. This damages divine spellcasters who follow the herexen's former faith regardless of their alignment. **Reap Faith** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Requirements** The fallen champion's last action was a Strike that dealt damage to a living creature; **Effect** The fallen champion saps the hope and faith from that creature. It takes 3d6 negative damage with a DC 25 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save. Regardless of the result of the save, the creature becomes [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) or increases the value of its frightened condition by 1.
